products.title: Rimini, Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

products.title: Stockholm Bright Orange Roller Blind
products.description: This bright orange roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This orange fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.

products.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.
